meta.description: Language labels for the Fluid Extbase Development Framework extension in the FRONTEND

languageKey.label: FED
File resource object
Filename
Filesize
Modified
Created
Data Source for Fluid Display
Name of this data source
Description of this data source
If specified, SQL Query is used to collect data
If specified, func is called to collect data
If specified, data is read from this url - remember to specify method
Method used to read url data
Fluid template file to use when rendering this DataSource
Optional Fluid template source code to use for rendering
CommandController Command
Extbase CommandController Task
Allows Extbase CommandController commands to be configured and executed through the scheduler framework.
Select Fluid FCE type
Layout: Columns
Divides content elements into columns, the number and widths of which can be configured.
Column layout
Column 1
Column 2
Column 3
Layout: Content Randomizer
Displays child content elements in a random fashion. Has option to define how many elements to select at random.
Number of random content elements to display
Content to be randomized
Layout: JQuery Accordion
Allows other content elements to be inserted into a jQuery Accordion widget.
Layout: JQuery Tabs
Allows other content elements to be inserted into a jQuery Tabs widget.
Naviation: Redirect
Allows a timeout-based redirection to a target page, showing a message and counting down before redirecting.
Naviation: Bread Crumb menu
Renders a page root line in the shape of a breadcrumb menu. Allows configuring the starting point and entryLevel.
Resource: Script as content element
Allows JavaScript code to be added to the page header through this content element.
Resource: Style as content element
Allows CSS styles to be added to the page header through this content element.
Resource: Social Bookmarks
Adds selected social bookmarks to your page - choose from FaceBook like, share and comment, Disqus, Twitter and Google+.
Display: Geocoded Address and Map
Displays a Google Map with a marker for one address. Supports any content element as address and as infowindow content in the Google Map.
Options
Map options
Address options
Load jQuery - in case your page does not include it. Uses Google's CDN Service.
Display headers above address and map
Display the address
Display the map
Map placement/position
Enable scale controls in map
Enable zoom controls in map
Enable pan controls in map
Enable map type controls in map
Zoom level on map - 1 to 20
Width of map element, fx '500px' or '100%'
Height of map element, fx '400px' or '50%'
Type of map display
Optional marker icon file
Address to display
Content under address
InfoWindow Content
Display: Customizable File List
Displays fully customizable list of files, with optional columns for file size, type, ctime etc. Can create a DataTable jQuery sortable table.
